title: Hopewell Culture National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar       Events Calendar Use the tools on this page to browse the park's calendar for all current and upcoming events. You can enter a date range that you wish to search within or you can enter a keyword to find an event.  Visit the Special Events page to see a full list of our annually occurring events.        A ranger speaks with visitors while on tour at Mound City Group NPS Photo  Ranger Guided Programs Dates: June 3 through September 4, 2016 Days:  Fridays, Saturdays and Sundays only Time:  10:00am Ranger guided programs range from patio talks, to tours to atlatl demonstrations.  If you are visiting on a Friday, Saturday or Sunday, check at the Mound City Visitor Center desk for information and program topic.  If you're visiting with a group, you can request a guided tour of the park.  Please call the park three weeks in advance to advise us of your visit so that we can confirm there will be sufficient staff on hand to provide the tour.  Please call the park at 740-774-1126 for more information or to schedule your tour.          Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Hopewell Culture National Historical Park Junior Archeology      Time: 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Mound City Group Visitor Center Fees: Free     Saturday, September 3, 2016 Children ages 5 -12 are invited to participate in this event. Children will complete several hands-on activities, including a mock dig, to earn a Junior Archeologist badge!  View Details
